@@ -329,13 +329,28 @@ public enum ErrorCode {
       HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND.toString(),
       "This view displays app-wise enrollment if you manage multiple studies."),

timeline.bodyText: verify returned values are actually sorted by siteId
timeline.author: saminguyen
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -515,23 +553,50 @@ public void shouldReturnStudyParticipantsForPagination() throws Exception {
       participantStudyEntity =
           testDataHelper.createParticipantStudyEntity(
               siteEntity, studyEntity, participantRegistrySiteEntity);
+      // Pagination records should be in descending order of created timestamp
+      // Entities are not saved in sequential order so adding delay
+      Thread.sleep(5);
     }
 
-    // get study participant if page and limit values are null
+    // Step 2: Call API and expect GET_PARTICIPANT_REGISTRY_SUCCESS message and fetch only 10 data
+    // out of 21
     mockMvc
         .perform(
             get(ApiEndpoint.GET_STUDY_PARTICIPANT.getPath(), studyEntity.getId())
                 .headers(headers)
+                .param("limit", "10")
+                .param("offset", "0")
+                .param("sortBy", "siteId")
+                .param("sortDirection", "desc")

replies.bodyText:
In Study Participant Registry page we have siteId column which is locationName in backend, hence verified locationName as below code
 .andExpect(
            jsonPath("$.participantRegistryDetail.registryParticipants[0].locationName")
                .value(LOCATION_NAME_VALUE + String.valueOf(9)))
replies.author: navya-BTC
